item.title: The 21 coolest inventions of 2015
item.description: 2015 has been an amazing year for innovation. Here are the best patents to be granted so far this year.
item.ExtractedText: The 21 coolest inventions of 2015 By David Goldman @DavidGoldmanCNN August 18, 2015: 7:10 AM ET Turn any object into a PlayStation controller - Sony 1 of 21 Imagine taking any 3-D object and using it to control a virtual bat, a pool cue, a bowling ball -- anything -- on your PlayStation. That's what Sony could be cooking up, according to a patent that the company filed earlier this year. The patent was initially discovered by technology firm SmartUp Legal . First published August 18, 2015: 7:10 AM ET Source: Research provided by legal technology firm SmartUp Legal. 1 of 21 Google+ Most stock quote data provided by BATS.
